legal_compliance.disclaimer: Decoding Den is an independent educational platform built entirely on publicly available Science of Reading research. Our content is original and research-informed, drawing from peer-reviewed studies by Ehri, Seidenberg, Adams, and other leading scientists. We are not affiliated with, derived from, or endorsed by any commercial reading program or proprietary curriculum.
legal_compliance.research_attribution: Our instructional design is based on findings from the National Reading Panel, IES Practice Guides, and decades of cognitive and linguistic research. All content is independently developed using evidence-based principles.
legal_compliance.compliance_verification: This content contains zero proprietary material and is built exclusively from publicly available research sources.
legal_compliance.prohibited_associations: This content is not derived from, affiliated with, or endorsed by LETRS, Wilson Reading System, Orton-Gillingham programs, or any commercial curriculum.

articulation_data.development_notes: One of the earliest sounds acquired. Should be mastered by age 3.
articulation_data.referral_notes: Early referral recommended if not present by age 4, as /m/ is foundational for speech development.

mastery_indicators: 90% accuracy across all measures for 2 weeks

week_1.differentiation: pace adjustment based on student needs

ai_prompts.lesson_generation: Create a Science of Reading lesson for /m/ including I Do/We Do/You Do structure
ai_prompts.word_generation: Generate CVC words with /m/ using only Stage 1 phonemes
ai_prompts.sentence_generation: Create decodable sentences with /m/ at 95% decodability

content_templates.lesson_structure: 5-minute phoneme introduction, 15-minute guided practice, 15-minute independent practice, 5-minute assessment
content_templates.story_structure: 3-5 sentences with target phoneme and taught graphemes only

articulation_data.development_notes: Complex fricative requiring precise tongue placement. Lisps are common until age 6.
articulation_data.referral_notes: Refer by age 7 if lateral or frontal lisp persists, or if sound is consistently incorrect.
articulation_data.articulation_cues: üëÑ Tongue near roof of mouth, air flows quietly

ai_prompts.lesson_generation: Design /s/ lesson with snake theme and multisensory activities
ai_prompts.word_generation: Create CVC word list with /s/ in initial and final positions
ai_prompts.sentence_generation: Write decodable sentences using /s/ and Stage 1 phonemes

content_templates.lesson_structure: snake sound introduction ‚Üí guided practice ‚Üí independent reading ‚Üí assessment
content_templates.word_practice: sound isolation ‚Üí syllable blending ‚Üí word reading ‚Üí application
content_templates.sentence_structure: simple sentences with /s/ words and familiar phonemes

articulation_data.development_notes: Short vowel, typically early developing. Foundation for vowel system.
articulation_data.referral_notes: Early screening by age 4 if vowel system appears compromised.
articulation_data.articulation_cues: üëÑ Mouth open, tongue low and forward. Vocal cords on

week_1.differentiation: extra mouth position practice for ELLs

week_2.differentiation: additional blending support for struggling learners

ai_prompts.lesson_generation: Create /a/ vowel lesson with apple theme and mouth position focus
ai_prompts.word_generation: Generate CVC words with short /a/ using Stage 1 consonants
ai_prompts.sentence_generation: Write simple sentences emphasizing /a/ vowel pattern
ai_prompts.assessment_generation: Design vowel discrimination assessment for /a/ mastery

content_templates.lesson_structure: vowel introduction ‚Üí mouth position practice ‚Üí CVC blending ‚Üí assessment
content_templates.word_practice: vowel isolation ‚Üí consonant-vowel blending ‚Üí full word reading ‚Üí application
content_templates.sentence_structure: simple CVC sentences with clear /a/ vowel patterns

articulation_data.development_notes: Voiceless alveolar stop. May show some variability until age 4.
articulation_data.referral_notes: Consider screening by age 5 if consistently incorrect or absent.

generation_rules: emphasize /t/ in initial and final positions

ai_prompts.lesson_generation: Create /t/ lesson with turtle theme and tongue placement focus
ai_prompts.word_generation: Generate CVC words with /t/ using taught phonemes only
ai_prompts.assessment_generation: Develop /t/ mastery assessment with clear criteria

content_templates.lesson_structure: sound introduction ‚Üí tongue placement ‚Üí blending ‚Üí application

articulation_data.development_notes: Early developing nasal sound. Should be consistent by age 3.
articulation_data.referral_notes: Consider screening if absent by age 4, especially with other nasal sound difficulties.

week_2.differentiation: extra nasal awareness for struggling learners

ai_prompts.lesson_generation: Create /n/ lesson with nose theme and nasal awareness
ai_prompts.word_generation: Generate CVC words with /n/ in various positions

content_templates.lesson_structure: nasal introduction ‚Üí airflow awareness ‚Üí blending ‚Üí discrimination

decodable_sentences: The fish is in the dish.

articulation_data.development_notes: Postalveolar fricative. Normal for 5-year-olds to substitute /s/ or /ch/.
articulation_data.referral_notes: Consider SLP screening by age 7, especially if /ch/, /s/, or /zh/ are also affected.

week_5.differentiation: explicit digraph instruction for struggling learners

week_6.differentiation: additional word practice for struggling readers

week_7.differentiation: varied text complexity for different levels

decodable_sentences: The fish is in the dish
generation_rules: use only taught phonemes for other positions

ai_prompts.lesson_generation: Create /sh/ digraph lesson emphasizing two letters one sound concept
ai_prompts.word_generation: Generate /sh/ words in initial and final positions using taught phonemes
ai_prompts.sentence_generation: Write decodable sentences featuring /sh/ digraph words
ai_prompts.assessment_generation: Design /sh/ digraph mastery assessment with clear criteria

content_templates.word_practice: digraph isolation ‚Üí position practice ‚Üí word reading ‚Üí spelling
content_templates.sentence_structure: simple sentences with /sh/ words and familiar phonemes
content_templates.story_structure: shopping or ship theme with /sh/ digraph focus
